channel.title: "Sith" village recruiting >:3
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread ""Sith" village recruiting >:3" - Answer the call of the dark side !

item.title: "Sith" village recruiting >:3
item.content:encoded:
We are the few, the proud, the Sith.

"Whath's a thith" you ask ? Come join us and you'll find out, but if, and only if, you'll be playing at least once a weekâ€¦ We have no use for talentless fools !

"What's in it for me" you ask ? That's the spirit ! We are keeping it a small group for a while and that means almost no taxes, so you'll become rich and strong in no time.

Think about it: power, unlimited power is waiting for you !
